# KadaiPOS Marketing Website - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Marketing website for KadaiPOS - a modern POS system for restaurants, built with Next.js 14+, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS with Airbnb-inspired clean design.

## Progress Checklist

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md file created
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements - Next.js marketing site with TypeScript, Tailwind, App Router
- [x] Scaffold the Project - Next.js created successfully
- [x] Customize the Project - Install shadcn/ui and create pages
- [x] Install Required Extensions
- [x] Compile the Project
- [x] Create and Run Task
- [x] Launch the Project
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- shadcn/ui components
- Framer Motion for animations

## Pages Structure
1. Home/Landing - Hero, features overview, CTA
2. Features - Detailed feature showcase
3. Pricing - Pricing tiers and plans
4. About - Company story and team
5. Contact - Contact form and info
6. Documentation - Getting started guides
